subject: Upcomming Lessons for Lexi
body:
Lexi Lessons

You're on the schedule. Here are the upcoming dates you are on the schedule for:


  1. Tue Dec 5, 2023 at 07:00 PM
  2. Tue Dec 19, 2023 at 07:00 PM

If any of this is incorrect, please contact us at:

  • Email: ggoadmusic@gmail.com
  • Phone: 336-406-1319

Extra Note

Hey Mrs. Kraftchick. This type of email should just come once a month.
